index-content.head_title: .NET, Java, Node.js, Python APIs & Online Metadata Manipulation Apps by {{NameCompany}}
index-content.head_description: Document Metadata APIs native to C# .NET & Java. Read, write, edit & compare meta information of all popular formats. Analyze & export metadata.
index-content.title: Document Metadata Management Solution
index-content.description_0: APIs and apps to read, edit, replace and remove metadata of documents, images and other file formats on popular platforms.
index-content.description_1: Add hidden metadata information to your business files and documents.
index-content.description_2: Modify or remove metadata that already presented in your documents.
index-content.description_3: Collect and analyze information about documents & files metadata.

sample_index.title: Remove unnecessary metadata from images and documents
sample_index.content: {{ProdShortName}} helps you easily remove hidden information from your files and documents. You can quickly delete details like when and where an image was taken, or remove author and editor info from Office documents.
sample_index.comment_1: Pass path to a document to {{TextMetadata}} constructor
sample_index.comment_2: Remove document properties connected to creator and editor

sample_1.code_title: How to get specific document metadata
sample_1.comment_1: Load source document to Metadata constructor
sample_1.comment_2: Get all the properties that contains the name of the last document editor
sample_1.comment_3: or the date/time the document was last modified

sample_2.code_title: How to add some missing metadata properties to a file regardless of its format.
sample_2.comment_2: Add a property containing the file last printing date if it's missing
sample_2.comment_3: Property will be added if the document supports such type of metadata
sample_2.comment_4: Save modified document to a specified path

actions.title: Ready to start?
actions.description: Try {{ProdShortName}} features for free or request a license
actions.description_index: Try {{ProdShortName}} features for free in your applications

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Have questions about our product? We have answers!

item_1.question: Does {{ProdShortName}} require third-party software for document metadata processing?
item_1.answer: {{ProdShortName}} operates independently; no external libraries like Microsoft Office or Adobe Acrobat are necessary.

item_2.question: Can I try out {{ProdShortName}} features before purchasing?
item_2.answer: Absolutely! {{ProdShortName}} offers a free trial. Install it and explore its capabilities. However, please note that trial versions add 'trial badges' to your documents, and only process the first 3 pages. For the complete experience, get a free 30-day temporary license for full functionality. Check out the details [here]({{LicensingUrl}}).

item_3.question: What types of licenses are available?
item_3.answer: Looking for a {{ProdShortName}} license? We've got you covered with various options. Choose from licenses tailored to your needs, based on factors like the number of developers on your team, deployment locations (e.g., single office or remote workplaces), and whether end-customer distribution requires sharing the SDK/API with clients. Alternatively, opt for a monthly usage license, where you pay based on your usage with metered plans. Explore further and find the perfect fit [here]({{PricingUrl}}).

item_3.content: Enhance your Java applications with powerful metadata management features using Metadata SDK for Java.

index-content-net.head_title: {{EnvNameShort}} Metadata Reader, Viewer, Extractor, Remover & Exporter API
index-content-net.head_description: {{ProgLang}} {{EnvNameShort}} metadata API to read, write, edit, analyze, search, extract, remove, compare & export metadata of PDF Word Excel PPTX Outlook Audio Video & Images.
index-content-net.title: {{EnvNameShort}} API to Manage & Manipulate Metadata
index-content-net.description: Build {{EnvNameShort}} Applications to Read, Edit, Remove, Retrieve, Search, Compare, Replace and Export Metadata Information of all Popular Documents & Image File Formats.

overview_feature_1.title: {{ProgLang}} applications integration
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} API is easy to integrate with {{ProgLang}}, {{AspNet}} and other {{EnvNameShort}} based applications to help your end-users manipulate metadata from a range of images, documents and other media file formats without installing any external software. The {{EnvNameShort}} metadata library supports building tools to quickly add metadata viewer, editor, remover, extractor, comparison and exporter functionalities within a number of industry standard document formats such as PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook emails, Project, Visio diagrams, OneNote, images, AutoCAD, Photoshop, audio, video and metafiles.

overview_feature_2.title: Various metadata types
overview_feature_2.description: The Metadata API is very flexible and easy to operate with. It gets the document file as input, analyses the metadata information, allows to perform supported meta data operations and save the modified file to access quickly in future use. It works with most notable metadata standards such as built-in, XMP, EXIF, IPTC, Image Resource Blocks, ID3 and custom metadata properties. Through {{ProdFullName}} API, you can also compare two documents to identify differences and similarities present in their metadata properties. You can also export metadata of required documents to Excel, CSV or DataSet.

overview_feature_3.title: All popular environments are supported
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} can be used to develop applications in any development environment that targets {{EnvNameShort}} platform. It is compatible with all {{EnvNameShort}} based languages and supports popular operating systems (Windows, Linux, MacOS) where {{Mono}} or {{EnvNameShort}} frameworks (including {{CoreNet}}) can be installed.

overview_feature_1.title: Control files & documents metadata
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} is an advanced metadata management API to manipulate metadata information of documents, images, archives, torrents and various other file formats. Developers can now enhance the functionality of their {{EnvNameShort}} applications by easily incorporating metadata viewing, modifying, deleting, extracting, searching, comparing, replacing and exporting features within all popular business document formats such as PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations & slides, Outlook emails, Project, Visio diagrams, OneNote, images, AutoCAD, Photoshop, audio, video, OpenType fonts and metafiles.

overview_feature_2.title: Manipulate built-in metadata
overview_feature_2.description: The {{EnvNameShort}} metadata library offers you features such as metadata search, replace metadata properties, compare metadata of supported file formats to identify similarities as well as differences. You can also edit or modify metadata for better information management and export retrieved metadata information to Excel file, CSV file and DataSet. The API offers comprehensive support to work with all commonly used metadata standards like built-in, XMP, EXIF and custom metadata properties within supported document formats.

overview_feature_3.title: Broad Platform Support
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} is compatible with all {{EnvNameShort}} versions and supports popular operating systems (Windows, Linux, MacOS) that are capable to run {{EnvNameShort}} runtime.

overview_feature_1.title: Main features
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} is an advanced library that empowers you to manage metadata within various file formats. Integrate metadata viewing, editing, deletion, searching, comparison, replacement, and export functionalities into your {{EnvNameShort}} applications. Supported formats include popular business documents like PDF, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Outlook emails, Project, Visio diagrams, OneNote, images (including PSD, CAD), audio, video, OpenType fonts, and metafiles.

overview_feature_2.title: Manipulate metadata easily
overview_feature_2.description: This library offers comprehensive features like metadata search, replacement, property comparison, and information extraction. You can export retrieved metadata to Excel, CSV, or DataSet formats. It supports commonly used metadata standards like built-in, XMP, EXIF, and custom properties within supported document formats.

overview_feature_3.title: Popular Platform Support
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} is compatible with all {{EnvNameShort}} versions and runs seamlessly on popular operating systems (Windows, Linux, macOS) that support {{EnvNameShort}} runtime.

index-content-cli-net.head_title: {{ProdCliShort}} to export, find, copy and remove metadata
index-content-cli-net.head_description: {{ProdCliFull}} helps you export, search, copy, and remove metadata from documents, images, audio, and video files. Control metadata easily using command prompt, PowerShell, Bash, and other tools.
index-content-cli-net.title: Handle Metadata Easily with {{ProdCliFull}}
index-content-cli-net.description: With {{ProdCliShort}} powered by {{ProdShortName}}, you can quickly read, export, copy, and remove metadata from popular document, image, and media formats.
index-content-cli-net.overview_description: A quick look at what {{ProdCliFull}} can do

overview_feature_1.title: Cross-platform CLI integration
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdCliShort}} works with the {{ProdFullName}} API and runs from the command line in PowerShell, Bash, Command Prompt, and other tools. It lets you view, edit, clean, extract, compare, and export metadata in documents, images, and media files without extra software.

overview_feature_2.title: Support for key metadata types
overview_feature_2.description: With {{ProdCliFull}}, you can open a file, review its metadata, make changes, and save it again. It supports major standards including built-in, XMP, EXIF, IPTC, Image Resource Blocks, ID3, and custom tags. You can also compare metadata between two files or export it to Excel, CSV, or DataSet for reporting.

overview_feature_3.title: Runs in any environment
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdCliFull}} works anywhere {{EnvNameShort}} is supported. It runs with different languages and is available on Windows, Linux, and macOS where {{Mono}} or {{EnvNameShort}} frameworks (including {{CoreNet}}) are installed.

features.title: {{ProdFullName}} highlights
features.description: Manage metadata in Office, PDF, images, multimedia, and more

feature_1.title: Access built-in & custom metadata
feature_1.content: Work with standard metadata and custom properties across supported files.

feature_2.title: Camera details in photos
feature_2.content: View photo details stored in metadata such as camera brand, model, and resolution.

feature_3.title: Detect or remove digital signatures
feature_3.content: Find digital signatures inside files and remove them if required.

feature_4.title: Photo geolocation
feature_4.content: Check or remove GPS location data embedded in image metadata.

feature_5.title: Metadata search
feature_5.content: Search through file properties and list any type of metadata.

feature_6.title: Protect business documents
feature_6.content: Clean hidden metadata and comments from business files and reports.

feature_7.title: Document previews
feature_7.content: Generate image previews for formats like EPUB, CAD, EML, and MSG.

feature_8.title: Matroska multimedia support
feature_8.content: Read Matroska subtitles and extract audio or video metadata.

feature_9.title: Archive & torrent metadata
feature_9.content: Read and manage metadata in archive files like ZIP and torrent files.

feature_10.title: File type recognition
feature_10.content: Detect file or stream type before processing metadata.

feature_11.title: Compare metadata
feature_11.content: Compare metadata from different files to find differences and similarities.

feature_12.title: Reduce hidden data
feature_12.content: Remove unnecessary hidden data from documents and images.

feature_13.title: Control Office files
feature_13.content: Find and remove hidden metadata in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files.

feature_14.title: Replace metadata
feature_14.content: Get a list of metadata entries and replace their values when needed.

feature_15.title: TIFF image support
feature_15.content: Add, update, or delete IPTC metadata in TIFF files.

feature_16.title: Excel metadata
feature_16.content: Extract metadata from Excel files starting from Excel 95.

feature_17.title: PNG metadata
feature_17.content: Read text metadata stored inside PNG images.

feature_18.title: MIME type detection
feature_18.content: Identify the MIME type of a file or stream instantly.

feature_19.title: Image thumbnails
feature_19.content: Retrieve thumbnails and previews for supported file formats.

feature_20.title: Matroska container security
feature_20.content: Check password protection and metadata in Matroska files.

feature_21.title: Built-in metadata keys
feature_21.content: Use defined keys to read metadata from supported formats.

feature_22.title: EXIF image metadata
feature_22.content: Edit EXIF tags in formats like WEBP, PNG, and PSD.

feature_23.title: Email & fonts metadata
feature_23.content: Read metadata from emails and OpenType font files.

feature_24.title: Multimedia metadata
feature_24.content: Extract XMP metadata from MOV, MP3, and WEBP files.

index-content-cli-net.platforms_description: {{ProdCliFull}} works across multiple operating systems, frameworks, and command line tools:

sample_bottom_1.title: Find hidden metadata
sample_bottom_1.content: Check and process metadata to better control document content:
sample_bottom_1.code_title: Get specific DOCX metadata using Bash
sample_bottom_1.comment_1: Retrieve the 'Author' property from a DOCX file

sample_bottom_2.title: Protect document content
sample_bottom_2.content: Remove hidden metadata from files to keep sensitive information safe:
sample_bottom_2.code_title: Clear a specific image property with Windows Command Prompt
